desc: Students focus on writing scientific papers, preparing scientific posters, and giving presentations in the context of a specific, year-long, interdisciplinary research project. In addition, this weekly seminar series builds collaborative research skills such as working in teams, performing reviews of statistical literature, consulting effectively, and communicating proficiently. Exposure to post-graduate opportunities in statistics is also provided. Open to students accepted into the Center for Interdisciplinary Research.
title: Statistical Research
